text:
e="preserve">Andrea Elizabeth Eugenio Torres (born May 4, 1990) is a Filipina actress, host, and commercial model. She is part of the GMA Network talents.
Career.
Her most notable roles include being on the shows Contessa, Victor Magtanggol, and Better Woman.
Personal life.
She was born Andrea Elizabeth Eugenio Torres on May 4, 1990. She graduated from University of Santo Tomas. She was previously in a relationship with her former leading man, Derek Ramsay. Their relationship ended on Nov 19, 2020.
